Class FileStats

public class FileStats
extends java.lang.Object

The FileStats class holds the filename/word length count map for a File. |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | CRC: FileStats | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Set/Retrieve Filename DfcClient | |Set/Retrieve Word Length Map FileProcessor | | | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------|

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides the toString method to provide more meaningful content. I decided to print the FileName followed by a table format of word length and then count as well as totals at the bottom to give a good picture of what the file contained.

Overrides:
